thread.title: 17 Times Jack And Karen Were The Real Stars Of "Will & Grace"
thread.title_full: 17 Times Jack And Karen Were The Real Stars Of "Will & Grace"

author: Ali Velez
title: 17 Times Jack And Karen Were The Real Stars Of "Will & Grace"
text:
View this image ›
NBC / Via meangirlgifs.tumblr.com Karen: Honey, you’re simple, you’re shallow and you’re a common whore. That’s why we’re soulmates.
ID: 10322391 2. When Karen gave Jack a dose of straight talk. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322441 3. And when Jack served her right back. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322442 4. When Karen was basically Jack’s life coach. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322443 5. When they amused themselves (and all of us) with their adorable little bits. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322692 6. When an enemy of Jack’s… View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322494 7. …Was instantly an enemy of Karen’s. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322805 8. When they were savage as fuck. View this image ›
NBC Jack: There are poor people who dream their whole lives of a meal like this.
Karen: Honey, I know what we should do! Let’s take a picture of us eating and show it to them.
Jack: Wow, Karen. You are like, a female Jesus.
ID: 10322496 9. When Jack saw the real Karen. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322497 10. When Karen gave Jack a little tough love. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322502 11. When Jack knew how to de-escalate a Karen meltdown. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322546 12. When they shared the same values. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322547 13. When they were bored by Will and Grace. View this image ›
NBC Karen: Oh, Lord! They’re like Siamese twins who are joined at their boring personalities.
ID: 10322548 14. When Karen was Jack’s own personal ATM. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10322595 15. When Jack gave Karen some valuable life advice. View this image ›
ID: 10322550 16. When they cheered each other up by touching stomachs. NBC
NBC
 ID: 10322640 17. And finally, when they made us all cry with their “Unforgettable” duet in the finale. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=KvFz6_vbjCY . youtube.com ID: 10322561 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
